column1: The Plaintiff has filed this appeal against the said judgment of the learned District Judge of Kegalle

column2: and  moves  that the  said  judgment be  set  aside  and  judgment be  entered  as  prayed  for  in  the

column1: Section 25(1) of the Partition Law requires the court to examine the title of each  party and  hear
and  receive  evidence in  support thereof.
column2: It has  been  consistently held that it is  the duty of the

column1: Court to examine and investigate title in a partition action, because the judgement is a judgement

column2: In  Gnanapandithen  and  another  v.  Balanayagam  and  another1  G.P.S.  De  Silva  c.J.
